mapper.sql: SELECT T1.ROW_ID as id /*记录ID*/ ,T1.CREATED as created /*创建时间*/ ,T1.CREATED_BY as createdBy /*创建者ID*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%S') as lastUpdated /*最后更新时间*/ ,T1.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy /*最后更新者ID*/ ,T1.ENCRYPTION_MODE as encryptionMode /*加密方式*/ ,T1.MENU_LINE_NAME as menuLineName /*主菜单下菜单名*/ ,T1.MENU_ID as menuId /*与主菜单关联字段*/ ,T1.SAMPLE_AFTER as sampleAfter /*示例（解密后）*/ ,T1.REQUEST_ADDRESS as requestAddress /*请求地址*/ ,T1.INTERFACE_SPECIFICATION as interfaceSpecification/*接口说明*/ ,T1.SAMPLE_BEFORE as sampleBefore /*示例（解密前）*/ ,GET_LOV_NAME(#{usercorpid},'DOC_TRANSMISSION_DIRECTION',T1.TRANSMISSION_DIRECTION) as transmissionDirection/*传输方向*/ ,T1.REQUEST_HEADER as requestHeader /*请求Header*/ ,GET_LOV_NAME(#{usercorpid},'DOC_JSON',T1.DATA_TYPE) as dataType /*数据类型*/ ,GET_LOV_NAME(#{usercorpid},'DOC_REQUEST_TYPE',T1.REQUEST_MODE) as requestMode /*请求方式*/ ,T1.SECRET_KEY_ENCRYPTION as secretKeyEncryption /*加密秘钥*/
mapper.update: UPDATE LNK_DOC_MENU_LINE SET ENCRYPTION_MODE =#{encryptionMode} /*加密方式*/ ,MENU_LINE_NAME =#{menuLineName} /*主菜单下菜单名*/ ,SAMPLE_AFTER =#{sampleAfter} /*示例（解密后）*/ ,REQUEST_ADDRESS =#{requestAddress} /*请求地址*/ ,INTERFACE_SPECIFICATION=#{interfaceSpecification}/*接口说明*/ ,SAMPLE_BEFORE =#{sampleBefore} /*示例（解密前）*/ ,TRANSMISSION_DIRECTION=#{transmissionDirection}/*传输方向*/ ,REQUEST_HEADER =#{requestHeader} /*请求Header*/ ,DATA_TYPE =#{dataType} /*数据类型*/ ,REQUEST_MODE =#{requestMode} /*请求方式*/ ,SECRET_KEY_ENCRYPTION=#{secretKeyEncryption}/*加密秘钥*/ WHERE ROW_ID=#{id}
